abstract: The mining giant Rio Tinto has offered to buy the Canadian aluminum company Alcan for $38.1 billion, the companies said Thursday, in a friendly takeover that counters a hostile bid by United States-based Alcoa.
lead_paragraph: The mining giant Rio Tinto has offered to buy the Canadian aluminum company Alcan for $38.1 billion, the companies said Thursday, in a friendly takeover that counters a hostile bid by United States-based Alcoa.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Rides in With $38 Billion Alcan Bid
